members.name: FileControllerClass
members.summary: Class for performing read/write actions on local files

members.name: FileController
members.summary: Class constructor. Gets a path to the file to control.
members.param: Path to the location of a file. Follows the pattern file.json

members.name: TryFileOperationRunner
members.summary: Helper method performing try-catch clauses in file oriented manner
members.param: Function to run inside of try-catch block
members.returns: Return the outcome of run function, if function return void, make the lambda function to return 0

members.name: ReadFileFromPath
members.summary: Function for reading the contents of a local file. Reads from the path passed during object initialization.
members.returns: Returns content of the file as a string
members.exception: If file does not exist or path is not correct the exception is thrown

members.name: WriteToFileFromPath
members.summary: Function for writing string data into a local file from a path
members.param: Content to be written to a file as a string

members.name: ReadData
members.summary: Function for reading the data of a local file. Reads from the path passed during object initialization.
members.returns: Returns data of the file as a string

members.name: WriteData
members.summary: Function for writing data into a local file
members.param: Content to be written to a file as a string
